page.title: 19A typical day for Angela
page.content:
7.45am. Up out of bed. Ready for school Jam, toast and tea for breakfast. 9am. Bell at school. Prayers first. 10.30am. Break. We play 'Monday Tues- day' jumping off the steps.
12.15pm. Lunch: soup, chips, egg and mushroom. Wash dishes. 1.15-2.15pm. Back in school till break. 3.30pm. School finishes. Go to gran's. 4.30pm. Home with mum and sister. 5.15pm. Dinner: fish-fingers, chips, cabbage and orange-juice. Watch TV - 'Gentle Ben'. Do homework. Jogging suit on. Take baby for walk. Play on bike. 8.25pm. Back in and ready for bed. Washed and have tea. 9.45pm. To bed.
